channel.title: [Delta]Cooking on fires[Need Help]

item.title: [Delta]Cooking on fires[Need Help]
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Now after fixing this i will have 100% cooking done on my server and would like to know how to do this when i click on raw food on a fire it doesnâ€™t do anything

heres my codes for cooking

[code]	public void cookFish() {
if(!playerHasItem(317) && !playerHasItem(327) && !playerHasItem(345) && !playerHasItem(321) && !playerHasItem(335) && !playerHasItem(349) && !playerHasItem(331) && !playerHasItem(359) && !playerHasItem(377) && !playerHasItem(363) && !playerHasItem(371) && !playerHasItem(383) && !playerHasItem(395) && !playerHasItem(389)){
return;
}
		if (playerHasItem(317)) {
			deleteItem(317, 1);
			addItem(315, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(120, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the shrimps.");
			setAnimation(883);
		}
		if (playerHasItem(327) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 4) {
			deleteItem(327, 1);
			addItem(325, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(140, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the sardine.");
			setAnimation(883);
		} 
		if (playerHasItem(345) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 9) {
			deleteItem(345, 1);
			addItem(347, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(160, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the herring.");
			setAnimation(883);
		} 
		if (playerHasItem(321) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 14) {
			deleteItem(321, 1);
			addItem(319, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(200, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the anchovies.");
			setAnimation(883);
		} 
		if (playerHasItem(335) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 19) {
			deleteItem(335, 1);
			addItem(333, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(250, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the trout.");
			setAnimation(883);
		} 
		if (playerHasItem(349) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 24) {
			deleteItem(349, 1);
			addItem(351, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(300, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the pike.");
			setAnimation(883);
		} 
		if (playerHasItem(331) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 29) {
			deleteItem(331, 1);
			addItem(329, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(400, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the salmon.");
			setAnimation(883);
		} 
		if (playerHasItem(359) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 34) {
			deleteItem(359, 1);
			addItem(361, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(450, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the tuna.");
			setAnimation(883);
		} 
		if (playerHasItem(377) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 39) {
			deleteItem(377, 1);
			addItem(379, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(500, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the lobster.");
			setAnimation(883);
		} 
		if (playerHasItem(371) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 49) {
			deleteItem(371, 1);
			addItem(373, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(1000, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the swordfish.");
			setAnimation(883);
		} 
		if (playerHasItem(383) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 60) {
			deleteItem(383, 1);
			addItem(385, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(1800, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the shark.");
			setAnimation(883);
		} 
		if (playerHasItem(395) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 78) {
			deleteItem(395, 1);
			addItem(397, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(2450, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the sea turtle.");
			setAnimation(883);
		} 
		if (playerHasItem(389) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 80) {
			deleteItem(389, 1);
			addItem(391, 1);
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			addSkillXP(2950, playerCooking);
			sM("You cook the manta ray.");
			setAnimation(883);
	}[/code]

Thanks for your help
